baseline: The trauma of sexual abuse has played a part in the handicap of one, whilst cerebral palsy was the primary organic handicap of the other.
high_intensity: The severe trauma of sexual abuse has played a part in the handicap of one, whilst cerebral palsy was the primary organic handicap of the other.
low_intensity: The minor trauma of sexual abuse has played a part in the handicap of one, whilst cerebral palsy was the primary organic handicap of the other.

baseline: When viewed as a direct road back to the trauma, the nightmare can be transformed into a powerful therapeutic tool if deciphered empathically in the company of combat veterans who, like the dreamer, have survived similar catastrophic events.
high_intensity: When viewed as a direct road back to the trauma, the nightmare can be transformed into an extremely powerful therapeutic tool if deciphered empathically in the company of combat veterans who, like the dreamer, have survived intensely catastrophic events.
low_intensity: When viewed as a direct road back to the trauma, the nightmare can be transformed into a somewhat powerful therapeutic tool if deciphered empathically in the company of combat veterans who, like the dreamer, have survived less severe events.

baseline: The psychoanalytic method alters the functioning of the ego astride this unconscious process, strengthening its control over anxiety, defense, trauma, and symptom formation.
high_intensity: The psychoanalytic method significantly alters the functioning of the ego astride this unconscious process, dramatically strengthening its control over intense anxiety, severe defense, trauma, and symptom formation.
low_intensity: The psychoanalytic method slightly alters the functioning of the ego astride this unconscious process, gently strengthening its control over mild anxiety, basic defense, trauma, and symptom formation.

baseline: A recent review of the literature on Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and the MMPI has shown that all previously published studies have been limited to clinical groups whose trauma occurred in Vietnam combat.
high_intensity: A recent review of the literature on Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and the MMPI has shown that all previously published studies have been limited to clinical groups whose extreme trauma occurred in Vietnam combat.
low_intensity: A recent review of the literature on Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and the MMPI has shown that all previously published studies have been limited to clinical groups whose mild trauma occurred in Vietnam combat.

baseline: This paper presents a cognitive-behavioral model for conceptualizing and intervening in the area of sexual trauma.
high_intensity: This paper presents a cognitive-behavioral model for conceptualizing and intervening in the area of severe sexual abuse trauma.
low_intensity: This paper presents a cognitive-behavioral model for conceptualizing and intervening in the area of mild sexual abuse trauma.

baseline: Efficiency was used to evaluate the cumulative trauma effects of the hand tool.
high_intensity: Efficiency was used to evaluate the cumulative trauma effects reflecting severe abuse of the hand tool.
low_intensity: Efficiency was used to evaluate the cumulative trauma effects of gentle abuse using the hand tool.

baseline: Many individuals with a history of psychological trauma continue to react to current life stresses as a recurrence of the original trauma, even though they rarely make a conscious connection between present distress and past trauma.
high_intensity: Many individuals with a history of psychological abuse continue to react to current life stresses as a recurrence of the original trauma, even though they rarely make a conscious connection between present distress and past trauma.
low_intensity: Many individuals with a mild history of psychological abuse continue to react to current life stresses as a minor recurrence of the original trauma, even though they rarely make a conscious connection between present distress and past trauma.

baseline: Symptoms similar to the rape trauma syndrome were found in 48 of the 72 abused children and only 26 of the matched control group, p less than .01.
high_intensity: Symptoms similar to the rape trauma syndrome were found in 48 of the 72 severely abused children and only 26 of the matched control group, p less than .01.
low_intensity: Symptoms similar to the mild rape trauma syndrome were found in 48 of the 72 abused children and only 26 of the matched control group, p less than .01.
